feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Move trigger definitions to shared-core. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15475
  • Modernise automation step tests. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15478
  • Detect iframe clicks via loss of focus by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15483
  • Fix searching for a date on a string field. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15489

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.1...3.4.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update type by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15490
  • Update pro ref by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15492

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.2...3.4.3

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Create an automation cron trigger test. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15488
  • Flesh out Google Sheets errors in testing to try and find a flake. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15491
  • Refactor automation builder. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15494
  • Further automation builder refactoring. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15500
  • replaces broken link by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15471
  • Data section resource deletion warning by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15499
  • Disabling grid cell formatting by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15505

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.3...3.4.4

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Show screens that are linked to the selected query by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15487
  • Design errors popover by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15477
  • Create tests for the row saved trigger. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15512
  • Fixes 503 errors on /api/global/auth/default/oidc/configs/ using https by @joecks in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15467
  • Allow multiple tenant users to be created for account holders by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15513

New Contributors

  • @joecks made their first contribution in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15467

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.4...3.4.5

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add tests for the row updated trigger. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15515
  • Bringing back AWS SDK V3 by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15324
  • Row deleted trigger tests. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15514
  • DS+ deletion - fix issue with incorrectly detecting as table by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15518
  • Fix clickoutside on firefox by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15517

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.5...3.4.6
